Develop new materials using natural and renewable resources like recycled paper, wood, or metal.
Utilize 3D printing technology to create durable and long-lasting objects without the use of plastic.
Implement the use of bioplastics, which are made from renewable resources like corn or sugarcane.
Use recycled materials like old tires, plastic bottles, or fishing nets to create new products.
Create new materials using plant-based plastics like starch, cellulose, or lignocellulose.
